医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
Klick Labs 推出高精度检测高血压的语音技术Klick 实验室的研究人员推出了一种尖端的非侵入性技术，只需使用人的声音即可高精度预测慢性高血压（高血压）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Klick-Labs-unveils-voice-technology-for-detecting-hypertension-with-high-accuracy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Klick-Labs-unveils-voice-technology-for-detecting-hypertension-with-high-accuracy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=87efd8d7-5cb6-43cb-9684-09fd15964cd7 Wed, 11 Sep 2024 14:07:52 -0400 Klick Labs unveils voice technology for detecting hypertension with high accuracy
斯克里普斯研究公司开发了在蛋白质中添加独特氨基酸的突破性技术这是每门生物学入门课上都会教授的一条教条：蛋白质是由 20 种不同的氨基酸组合而成，像单词一样排列成不同的序列。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Scripps-Research-develops-breakthrough-technique-for-adding-unique-amino-acids-to- Proteins.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Scripps-Research-develops-breakthrough-technique-for-adding-unique-amino-acids-to- Proteins.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=435ae8c7-c023-4bca-a7ac-ff3e29b593ca Wed, 11 Sep 2024 14:02:44 -0400 Scripps Research develops breakthrough technique for adding unique amino acids to proteins
2-溴棕榈酸酯通过调节棕榈酰化减少人类细胞的衰老表型2024年8月23日，一篇新的研究论文发表在Aging（被MEDLINE/PubMed列为“Aging (Albany NY)”和Web of Science的“Aging-US”）第16卷第16期，题为“2-溴棕榈酸酯治疗可减弱人类成体细胞的衰老表型——棕榈酰化的可能作用。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/2-bromopalmitate-reduces-senescent-phenotype-in​​- human-cells-by-modulate-palmitoylation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/2-bromopalmitate-reduces-senescent-phenotype-in​​- human-cells-by-modulate-palmitoylation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1bd82406-824b-4e32-9055-7a1a8e7b0722 Wed, 11 Sep 2024 13:47:34 -0400 2-bromopalmitate reduces senescence phenotype in human cells by modulating palmitoylation
Telisotuzumab vedotin 在 c-Met 过表达 NSCLC 亚洲患者中显示出有希望的结果针对 c-Met 的抗体药物偶联物 telisotuzumab vedotin 在 c-Met 蛋白过度表达、表皮生长因子受体 (EGFR) 野生型 (WT)、局部晚期/转移性非鳞状细胞癌的亚洲患者中表现出持久的反应和可接受的安全性根据今天在国际肺癌研究协会 2024 年世界肺癌大会上公布的研究结果，该研究表明非小细胞肺癌 (NSCLC) 的风险更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Telisotuzumab-vedotin-shows-promising-results-in-asian-患者-with-c-Met-overexpressing-NSCLC.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Telisotuzumab-vedotin-shows-promising-results-in-asian-患者-with-c-Met-overexpressing-NSCLC.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fc776511-6b9d-4b50-b3e4-607cf07e1c97 Wed, 11 Sep 2024 13:42:31 -0400 Telisotuzumab vedotin shows promising results in asian patients with c-Met overexpressing NSCLC
特朗普、哈里斯首次对峙就堕胎权和奥巴马医改问题发生争执周二晚上，当副总统卡马拉·哈里斯走过辩论台与前总统唐纳德·特朗普握手时，这是两人第一次面对面见面。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Trump-Harris-spar-over-abortion-rights-and-Obamacare-in-their-first-face-off.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Trump-Harris-spar-over-abortion-rights-and-Obamacare-in-their-first-face-off.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5861cb65-47c4-465a-bc51-4853be88457a Wed, 11 Sep 2024 13:35:41 -0400 Trump, Harris spar over abortion rights and Obamacare in their first face-off
巴西研究揭示了肝神经如何在压力下调节葡萄糖的产生巴西研究人员领导的一项研究详细描述了肝脏神经的形态以及它们在生物体处于压力下如何控制葡萄糖的产生。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Brazilian-research-uncovers-how-liver-nerves-regulate-glucose-product-under-stress.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Brazilian-research-uncovers-how-liver-nerves-regulate-glucose-product-under-stress.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e14a82ca-6e9e-4a45-a91b-b5c976183c1a Wed, 11 Sep 2024 13:32:03 -0400 Brazilian research uncovers how liver nerves regulate glucose production under stress
研究表明 CAR T 细胞疗法与其他疗法相比，发生第二原发恶性肿瘤的风险较低根据系统评价和荟萃分析，癌症幸存者在接受 CAR T 细胞治疗后出现第二原发性恶性肿瘤 (SPM) 的频率与接受其他标准护理治疗后出现的 SPM 的频率在统计上相当。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Study-shows-CAR-T-cell-therapys-risk-of-second-primary-malignancies-comparable-to-other-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Study-shows-CAR-T-cell-therapys-risk-of-second-primary-malignancies-comparable-to-other-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cf892b68-54de-4e81-9303-17a2ea86ba5e Wed, 11 Sep 2024 13:20:38 -0400 Study shows CAR T-cell therapy's risk of second primary malignancies comparable to other treatments
研究发现焦亡可促进伤口愈合和组织修复Kodi Ravichandran 教授（VIB-根特大学炎症研究中心）及其同事的一项研究发现，细胞焦亡（一种传统上被认为纯粹是炎症的程序性细胞死亡形式）在促进愈合和组织修复方面也发挥着至关重要的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Pyroptosis-found-to-promote-wound-healing-and-tissue-repair.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Pyroptosis-found-to-promote-wound-healing-and-tissue-repair.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=07150c5a-7d3c-42a6-8c86-ab286ed50dce Wed, 11 Sep 2024 13:08:10 -0400 Pyroptosis found to promote wound healing and tissue repair
研究表明，压力引起的精子活力变化发生在压力事件之后科罗拉多大学安舒茨医学院的研究人员领导的一项开创性研究表明，压力引起的精子活力变化发生在压力事件之后，而不是压力事件期间，并提高了精子的表现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Stress-induced-changes-in-sperm-motility-occur-after-a-stressful-event-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Stress-induced-changes-in-sperm-motility-occur-after-a-stressful-event-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4ea33c98-dfd8-40b0-a82d-dc52fae133cb Wed, 11 Sep 2024 12:59:49 -0400 Stress-induced changes in sperm motility occur after a stressful event, study shows
对拟南芥植物的研究揭示了表观遗传调控的新见解生物学中最令人着迷的发现之一是细胞具有动态调节基因表达的机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Study-on-Arabidopsis-thaliana-plants-reveals-new-insights-into-epigenic-regulation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240911/Study-on-Arabidopsis-thaliana-plants-reveals-new-insights-into-epigenic-regulation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=558a9a44-8626-4a6e-a12a-8691d9855fe5 Wed, 11 Sep 2024 12:45:57 -0400 Study on Arabidopsis thaliana plants reveals new insights into epigenetic regulation
